metadata.title: USN-6843-1 -- Plasma Workspace vulnerability
metadata.description: Fabian Vogt discovered that Plasma Workspace incorrectly handled connections via ICE. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to gain access to another user's session manager and execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6843-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libcolorcorrect5 - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 libkfontinst5 - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 libkfontinstui5 - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 libkworkspace5-5 - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 libnotificationmanager1 - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 libplasma-geolocation-interface5 - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 libtaskmanager6 - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 libweather-ion7 - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 plasma-workspace - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 plasma-workspace-data - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 plasma-workspace-dev - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 plasma-workspace-wayland - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 sddm-theme-breeze - 4:5.24.7-0ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
